content: calla by annie baker anniebakerdesigns com simple asymmetrical poncho is knit in the round from the top down using stockinette and reverse stockinette stitches you will need 750 to 1 550 meters dk weight yarn and 4mm / us 6 circular needles pictured brown poncho is knit without cowl neck and pictured blue poncho is knit with cowl neck both ponchos are size l and shown on us size 12 dressform enjoy materials without cowl neck / with cowl neck 750 / 950 meters for size s 850 / 1 050 meters for size m 950 / 1 150 meters for size l 1 100 / 1 350 meters for size xl 1 300 / 1 550 meters for size xxl 4 00 mm / us 6 circular needles 3 stitch markers one unique gauge stockinette stitch 22 stitches and 30 row = 4 inches suggested sizing s for bust measurement = 30 to 33 inches m for bust measurement = 34 to 37 inches l for bust measurement = 38 to 41 inches xl bust measurement = 42 to 45 inches xxl for bust measurement = 45 to 48 inches please also use neck opening measurements as sizing guide for both cowl neck and plain neck versions ©copyright 2013 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used 25 inches around v-neck x 75 inches around widest part 24 inches v-neck to bottom point xl 27 inches around v-neck x 81 inches around widest part 25 inches v-neck to bottom point xxl 29 inches around v-neck x 87 inches around widest part 25 inches v-neck to bottom point abbreviations k = knit p = purl yo = yarn over needle to make one stitch sm = stitch marker pm = place stitch marker note instructions are written for different sizes as follows s/m/l/xl/xxl try on as you knit and add length if necessary instructions cast on 100/114/130/146/162 stitches beginning working in the round be careful not to twist stitches round 1 place unique stitch marker to mark beginning of round k to end of round round 2 knit if making cowl neck version of poncho repeat round 2 until work measures 7/7/8/8/8 inches proceed to round 3 round 3 knit if you are making xl or xxl please knit one round more round 4 k44/51/59/66/74 pm k12/12/12/14/14 pm k44/51/59/66/74 round 5 k to 2 sts before sm yo k4 yo twice k to end of round round 6 k to end of round repeat rounds 5 and 6 another 67/67/69/69/71 times or
